metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugins for code review, development workflows, and prompt engineering

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Comprehensive code review workflow: branch reviews, PR triage, false positive dismissal, and fix tracking

plugins.name: prd-toolkit
plugins.description: Create and manage Product Requirements Documents (PRDs) with AI assistance. Publish to GitHub Issues or ClickUp.

plugins.name: python-development
plugins.description: Python development skills: Pydantic v2 data validation, Django Ninja APIs, and modern Python patterns

plugins.name: claude-md-toolkit
plugins.description: Analyze and optimize CLAUDE.md files using Anthropic's best practices for prompt engineering, XML tags, and memory patterns

plugins.name: discussion-toolkit
plugins.description: Critical feature discussion and idea refinement with skeptical Staff Engineer perspective
